Rainway | Frontend Development | Seattle, WA | Onsite | https://jobs.github.com/positions/c18b0c4c-9571-11e8-8622-e0...

We believe people should be able to play anywhere. Rainway is a web-based game-streaming platform that lets users do just that with their favorite games. Now they can enjoy games like Overwatch, Cuphead, PlayerUnknownâ€™s Battlegrounds and much more anywhere. You can read more about our mission here.

We're looking for a full-time JavaScript/TypeScript Frontend Developer with love for video games and killer web applications built with new technologies.

Full description: https://jobs.github.com/positions/c18b0c4c-9571-11e8-8622-e0...
